name: Bargloth's Quest
description:
Made for GBJam5, this was a solo project by Tres Sims, made in Game Maker Studio,

Bargloth's Quest, Beat the Monster, Save the Day, Can you work your way through the wilds, into the dungeon, and finally, defeat the boss?

Use the arrow keys to move, Space to jump, and Ctrl to shoot. Alt+Enter for full-screen.
